name: Rogue Sweeper
description:
In addition to the rules of Minesweeper, we will explore the stage by making good use of the items obtained during the exploration.
Various treasures are hidden in the treasure chests along the way.
Some items hard to come by.
Let's collect treasures steadily in the Unique world of gypsy jazz with stages full of surprises!

Game overview

A dungeon exploration adventure game where you search for treasure according to the rules of Minesweeper.
There are 10 types of dungeons in total. It gets harder as you proceed.
Let’s collect treasures using tool you got along the way.
You can collect 25 kinds of unique treasures!
Can you grant your grandpa’s life long dream? It’s up to you How it will turn out to be.

The charm of this work

【View of the world】
10 dungeons are decorated with fascinating world views such as grasslands and witch towns and gypsy jazz.

【Items to reduce luck factors】
When it comes to difficult levels of Minesweeper, luck factors tend to get involved.
Therefore, we are reducing the luck factor peculiar to Minesweeper with special items.
·mobile phone
An item that safely digs 1 square in the direction you are facing
・ Bulletproof vest
Items that protect you from dynamite
・ Space-time device
An item that can be used to warp one level ahead

【System that does not induce mistakes】
・ Bulk digging system
You can dig around 8 squares where nothing is written on the squares at once.
This will prevent you from accidentally digging for dynamite!
・ Flag system
You will not be able to dig where you have flagged.
Where do you not understand? You can also put!
